mapper.select: SELECT IU.*, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME FROM IAG_USER IU JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (IU.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN POSITION P ON (IU.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO) WHERE IU.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT IU.*, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME FROM IAG_USER IU JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (IU.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN POSITION P ON (IU.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO)
SELECT IU.* FROM IAG_USER IU WHERE IU.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT UL.*, L.LV_NAME, IU.NAME, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM LEAVE L JOIN USAGE_LV UL ON (L.LV_CODE = UL.LV_CODE) JOIN IAG_USER IU ON (UL.USER_NO = IU.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (IU.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE IU.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY UL.LV_END DESC

SELECT UL.*, L.LV_NAME, IU.NAME, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM LEAVE L JOIN USAGE_LV UL ON (L.LV_CODE = UL.LV_CODE) JOIN IAG_USER IU ON (UL.USER_NO = IU.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (IU.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE IU.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'ALV%' AND UL.LV_END BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY UL.LV_END ASC
SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'ALV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY UL.LV_END DESC
SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'LV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY UL.LV_END DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ALV.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'ALV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY UL.LV_END DESC ) ALV ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{pageVoAlv.startRow} AND #{pageVoAlv.endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, LV.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'LV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE ORDER BY UL.LV_END DESC ) LV ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{pageVoAlv.startRow} AND #{pageVoAlv.endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'ALV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'LV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE
SELECT * FROM LEAVE WHERE LV_CODE LIKE 'LV%'
